Text: Second-quarter investment banking revenues totaled $104.3 million, a 30% increase from the same period in 2018. PlacementTracker listed Cowen as the most active publicly listed placement agent, leading more than $1.1 billion in investments across 17 deals in the second quarter.
Cause: PlacementTracker listed Cowen as the most active publicly listed placement agent
Effect: leading more than $1.1 billion in investments across 17 deals in the second quarter.
Sentence: Second-quarter investment banking revenues totaled $104.3 million, a 30% increase from the same period in 2018. <e1>PlacementTracker listed Cowen as the most active publicly listed placement agent</e1>, <e2>leading more than $1.1 billion in investments across 17 deals in the second quarter.</e2>
